name: CallLocalFunction
warnings: CallLocalFunction crashes the server if it's passing an empty string.
description: Calls a public function from the script in which it is used.

params_body.name: {Float,_}:...
params_body.description: 'Indefinite' number of arguments of any tag

return_values: The value that the only public function returned.
related_fn: CallRemoteFunction: Call a function in any loaded script.
